20 // std
21 #include <memory>
22 
23 // ros
24 #include <ros/ros.h>
25 
26 // niryo
27 #include "cpu_interface/cpu_interface_core.hpp"
28 
33 void readTemperature(const std::shared_ptr<cpu_interface::CpuInterfaceCore> &cpu)
34 {
35  ros::Rate read_rpi_diagnostics_rate = ros::Rate(1);
36 
37  while (ros::ok())
38  {
39  int temperature = cpu->getCpuTemperature();
40  ROS_INFO("cpu temperature = %d", temperature);
41  read_rpi_diagnostics_rate.sleep();
42  }
43 }
44 
45 int main(int argc, char **argv)
46 {
47  ros::init(argc, argv, "cpu_interface_node");
48 
49  ROS_DEBUG("Launching cpu_interface_node");
50 
51  ros::AsyncSpinner spinner(4);
52  spinner.start();
53 
54  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
55 
56  auto cpu = std::make_shared<cpu_interface::CpuInterfaceCore>(nh);
57 
58  std::thread readTempThread(readTemperature, cpu);
59  readTempThread.join();
60  ros::waitForShutdown();
61 
62  ROS_INFO("shutdown node");
63 }
